 High acid corrosion control  LAKSHMI NARAYANAN  
Technical Consultant | Product Application Specialist  
Solution -oriented Chemical Engineer offering 10 years of successful track record as 
a Sales & Service consultant in the Petroleum Refining & Petrochemica ls – Oil & Gas 
and Lubricants Industry . Offered value -adding technical  support to clients with key 
focus on exploring new business interests, better product performance, and market 
Penetration.  Extensive Technical Presentation skill  coupled with gracious 
capability in Multilingual Communication. Strong Team builder with proven ability 
to recruit, train and manage team for better productivity.  
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
 
Sales Manager   Jan 2024 – Present  
ULTRA UNICHEM, UAE  
 
Sales Manager spearheading Sales & Marketing of Specialty chemicals for Oil & 
Gas, Raw materials for Lubricants, Detergents, Finished Lubricants, and more. 
Responsibilities : 
• Prime focal point for Business development in UAE & East African 
countries  for Oil field Production chemicals , Finished Lubricants , RM for 
Detergents . 
• Successfully m arketed Products like Demulsifiers,  Drag Reducing Agents, 
Pipeline Corrosion Inhibitors , along with other Process & Oil filed 
chemicals . 
• Hands -on experience in Marketing of Lubricant Additives  – TBN Boosters, 
PPD, PIB, Additive packages – Engine Oil, Gear Oil, Hydraulic oil, and more.  
• Travelled to East Africa countries (South Sudan, Ethiopia & Uganda) for 
exploring Business development opportunities  and to develop  a strong 
pipeline of profitable Project opportunities . 
• Leading Team of 3 – Sales Engineers , manag ing the entire sales process, 
from lead generation to customer acquisition and retention.  
• Negotiate d contracts with customers , Technology Partners, Independent 
consultants for Potential collaborations & partnerships.  
 
Senior Sales Engineer   July 2014 – Dec 2018  
Dec 2019 – Dec 2023  DORF KETAL Chemicals, UAE & INDIA  
 
Key Account Manager responsible for Sales  & Technical support of Process 
Chemicals, Finished Fuel Additives & Lubricant additive components  in UAE.  
Responsibilities (UAE – 2019 to 2023):  
• Marketed chemicals like Antifoulants, Demulsifiers, Corrosion Inhibitors, 
Neutralizing amines, Antioxidants , H2S Scavengers  and more.  
• Responsible for Key business accounts across Fujairah, Dubai & Sharjah.  
• Handled Business accounts over 3.5 MUSD  between 2019 -202 3 for Dorf Ketal 
Chemicals . Consistently achieved over & above budget in process chemicals , 
Finished Fuel Sales . 
• Carried out Business development & Market mapping of Lubricant additive 
components business in UAE  and successfully introduced Mobil brand  of 
lubricant additive component  valuing 0.25 MUSD  every quarter.  

 
  Working proficiency in MS Office – 
Word, Excel and PowerPoint  
 Crude Distillation  
 Customer Relationship Management 
(CRM)
